content.prompt: Which of the following statements can be supported by the data in the line graph?

choices.label: Democratic members of Congress are reelected at a higher rate than Republican members of Congress.
The overall rate at which members of Congress are reelected is less than 30 percent.
Senators are more likely to be reelected than members of the House of Representatives.
Members of the House of Representatives are more likely to be reelected than defeated.
